description:
Mero Currency describes itself as a low burn-rate deflationary token. Whenever Mero is transferred, 0.001% of the amount is burned. This increases the value of MRO over time. Mero Currency aims to drive mass-adoption of cryptocurrency payments through open-source development of payment options, starting with a donation engine.

name: Mero Currency
